question: Hello All , I am a 32 year old guy with Diabetes for 2 years (although no medication ,Only Diet Control) .I had some major problems with Having strong erection & maintain it for proper intercourse . I visited a doctor 2 weeks back and he checked my testosterone level and it came back as 8 (It is Canadian standards where normal range is 7.6 -31 ).My doctor told me that it it is normal and nothing to worry about .What does everybody think here ? Is it normal for some one at age 32 have a level of 8 ?
title: Testosterone levels at 32 ?
